overview: Featuring interviews with Capone, Melle Mel, and Ali Shaheed Muhammad, as well as live performances from M.O.P, Dead Prez and Company Flow, WORD exposes the hip-hop underground scene, and offers guidance for budding MCs hoping to reach the heady heights scaled by some of their peers.
tagline: UNDERGROUND MCs "Are you in it for the fame or are you in it for the love?"
title: Word: A Hip-Hop Film
